title: Baddiewinkle
text:
Helen Ruth Elam (born July 18, 1928), better known as Baddiewinkle or Baddie Winkle, is an American internet personality. Elam was born in <a href="Hazard%2C%20Kentucky">Hazard</a>, <a href="Kentucky">Kentucky</a>. She became an Internet sensation at the age of eighty-five. Her social media tag line—"Stealing Your Man Since 1928"—has become a popular saying for teens and young adults. She is known for her humor and for fighting against ageism through her personal style and messaging, characterized by wearing eccentric clothes, promoting the legalization of medical <a href="marijuana">marijuana</a>, and her <a href="innuendo">innuendo</a>. Winkle is an activist and influencer whose self expression is a statement of disapproval of the beauty industry and the false limitations it imposes on individuals, and especially on women. She has millions of followers and views on social media, where she posts photos and videos of herself, often with suggestive clothing with peculiar prints, or little clothing in order to encourage body positivity and the celebration of the physiques of older adults.
Career.
Winkle has gathered a following after initially getting help from her great granddaughter, Kennedy Lewis, to upload an image to <a href="Twitter">Twitter</a>, while wearing her great-granddaughter's clothes. She was subsequently followed by <a href="Rihanna">Rihanna</a>, and now has a worldwide following. In 2015 she reached one million followers on <a href="Instagram">Instagram</a>. She currently lives in <a href="Knoxville%2C%20Tennessee">Knoxville, Tennessee</a>, and has appeared on "<a href="The%20Today%20Show">The Today Show</a>", Australia.
In 2015, Grit Creative Group used her as the face of their website launch campaign, where she dressed as <a href="Kurt%20Cobain">Kurt Cobain</a>, <a href="Kate%20Moss">Kate Moss</a> and others. Baddie helped kick off season two of <a href="Nicole%20Richie">Nicole Richie</a>'s "<a href="Candidly%20Nicole">Candidly Nicole</a>" on VH1. She also appeared on the <a href="Red%20Carpet">Red Carpet</a> at the <a href="Netflix">Netflix</a> promotion for "<a href="Orange%20Is%20the%20New%20Black">Orange Is the New Black</a>". She attended the 2015 "<a href="MTV%20Video%20Music%20Awards">MTV Video Music Awards</a>" as a guest of <a href="Miley%20Cyrus">Miley Cyrus</a> and <a href="MTV">MTV</a>. In 2016, she was in a national commercial for Smirnoff ICE Electric Flavors as part of their "Keep It Moving" campaign. She continues to entertain with her pictures, videos, and collaborations with well-known brands and celebrities.
